Posts.Content: Hi. It's 2 weeks after my 2nd cycle of THP. Starting to feel semi normal again apart from everything tastes awful and mouth feels like it has a coating of oil? Any advice, as I am actually feeling hungry yet don't want anything..
Posts.Title: Everything tastes awful!

Posts.Content: Thank you everyone. Fruit is my best friend at the moment and plain cooked vegetables. Meat I just can't enjoy and I've struggled with cheese pre-Chemo.  I will try the bicarbonate mouth wash. X
Posts.Title: Everything tastes awful!

Posts.Content: Thank you I love pineapple will try that
Posts.Title: Everything tastes awful!

Posts.Content: Bicarbonate soda mouth wash helps a bit. I've also been sucking pear drops and lemon sherbets.  I found that most of the mouth washes are too strong and make me gag more, but children's toothpaste is tolerable.  I'm 4 treatments in, with 3 to go and each time it gets a little bit worse. Good luck x
Posts.Title: Metalic mouth
